PASSWORD.LABEL: Password
PASSWORD.ERROR: Please enter a valid and secure password.

HINT.TITLE: Passwort information
HINT.MESSAGE:
Your password must match this criteria:
  • Min. 1 lowercase letter
  • Min. 1 uppercase letter
  • Min. 1 special character
  • Min. 1 number
  • Min. 8 characters long

JOIN_AREA.TITLE: Congratulation!
JOIN_AREA.MESSAGE: You successfully joined the team area.

LOGIN.PAGE_DESCRIPTION: That’s not good in these COVID-19 times. But we have created the Office Check-in. The tool to manage your stays on site at the office. Book your office day now!

EMAIL.LABEL: Email address
EMAIL.ERROR: Please enter a valid email address

ERRORS.TITLE: Login failed!
ERRORS.WRONG_CREDENTIALS: You entered a wrong email address or password.
ERRORS.USER_NOT_VERIFIED: Please verify your user account first. You should have received an email with a confirmation link.
ERRORS.TOO_MANY_REQUESTS: Too many wrong login attempts. Please try again in a few minutes.

RESEND_EMAIL_VERIFICATION_SUCCESS.TITLE: Great! You almost made it!
RESEND_EMAIL_VERIFICATION_SUCCESS.MESSAGE: We’ve sent you a link to confirm your email address again. Please check your inbox. It could take up to 10 minutes to show up in your inbox.

SIGNUP.PAGE_DESCRIPTION: Nice that you also want to plan your office day with foresight. Create your account to book your office day now!

TEAMNAME.LABEL: Team name
TEAMNAME.PLACEHOLDER: Please enter the name of your team.
TEAMNAME.ERROR: Please enter a valid team name.

TEAMROLE.LABEL: Team role
TEAMROLE.PLACEHOLDER: Please describe your role / responsibility in this team shortly.

EMAIL.LABEL: Email address
EMAIL.ERROR: Please enter a valid email address.

HINT.TITLE: Passwort information
HINT.MESSAGE:
Your password must match this criteria:
  • Min. 1 lowercase letter
  • Min. 1 uppercase letter
  • Min. 1 special character
  • Min. 1 number
  • Min. 8 characters long

ERRORS.TITLE: Registration failed!
ERRORS.UNKNOWN: An error occurred during your account registration.
ERRORS.PASSWORD_TOO_WEAK: Your password is too weak. Please choose a stronger one.
ERRORS.EMAIL_IN_USE: It seems your email is already registered with an account.
ERRORS.EMAIL_INVALID: Please enter a valid email address.

SUCCESS.TITLE: Great! You almost made it!
SUCCESS.MESSAGE: You’ve successfully registered for Office Check-in. We’ve sent you a link to confirm your email address. Please check your inbox. It could take up to 10 minutes to show up in your inbox.

SIGNUP_SELECT.PAGE_DESCRIPTION: Nice that you also want to plan your office day with foresight. Create your account to book your office day now!

MEMBER.TITLE: Team member
MEMBER.HINT: As a Team member you are able to book your office days into a team area that you have joined.

MANAGER.TITLE: Team manager
MANAGER.HINT: As a Team manager you are additionally able to create a new team area for your team location and invite team members to join your team area.

MEMBER.TITLE: Team member role
MEMBER.MESSAGE: As a Team member you are able to book your office days into a team area that you have joined.

MANAGER.TITLE: Team manager role
MANAGER.MESSAGE: As a Team manager you are additionally able to create a new team area for your team location and invite team members to join your team area.

PASSWORD_RESET.PAGE_TITLE: Recover your access to Office Check-in
PASSWORD_RESET.PAGE_DESCRIPTION: If you forgot your password or cannot log in anymore you can request a new password here.

FORM.TITLE: Please fill in your email address

EMAIL.LABEL: Email address
EMAIL.ERROR: Please enter a valid email address.

ERRORS.TITLE: Password reset failed!
ERRORS.UNKNOWN: Please try to reset your password later.
ERRORS.EMAIL_INVALID: Please enter a valid email address.

SUCCESS.TITLE: Password reset started!
SUCCESS.MESSAGE: You should receive an email with information on how to reset your password within the next minutes.

LIST.PAGE_DESCRIPTION: Protect yourself and your colleagues. Stay Healthy!

ACTION.DELETE_BOOKING_CONF: Your booking has been successfully deleted.

ADD.PAGE_DESCRIPTION: Start your booking by choosing your team area. Depending on which team area you choose, the bookable days are displayed.
ADD.INFO_NO_AREAS_JOINED: You haven't joined an area yet.

DATE.TITLE: Choose your check-in date
DATE.LABEL: Enter a date or select one with the calendar

ERRORS.ERROR_SEAT: Can't book a seat in this area for you.
ERRORS.AREA_BOOKED: Area already fully booked for that day.
ERRORS.DAY_BOOKED: You already booked a room for that day.

SUCCESS.TITLE: Awesome
SUCCESS.MESSAGE: You successfully completed your office booking!

CONFIRMATION.TITLE: Delete booking
CONFIRMATION.MESSAGE: Are you sure you want to delete the selected booking?

LIST.NO_MANAGER_REQUEST_MANAGER: You are currently not registered as a team manager and therefore cannot create new team areas yourself. Click below to change your role.
LIST.BECAME_TEAM_MANAGER: You now have the role of team manager
LIST.PAGE_DESCRIPTION: Team managers and admins can invite team members via invitation link.

CONFIRMATION.TITLE: Delete team area
CONFIRMATION.MESSAGE: Are you sure? Do you really want to delete this team area? This process cannot be undone

JOIN.PAGE_DESCRIPTION: Welcome to Office Check-In. You are going to join a team area through an invitation link.

NOT_AUTHORIZED.TEXT: you must be logged in to join an area

ERROR.TEXT: could not join area. please try agan later.

INVITE_AREA_MEMBERS.PAGE_DESCRIPTION: Use the link to allow your team members to join the area.
INVITE_AREA_MEMBERS.INVITE_DESCRIPTION:
Share the following link with your team members (e.g. by email). Your team can join the area by using the link.

If you want to book on this area, please use the join link as well.

CREATE_AREA.PAGE_DESCRIPTION: Team managers can create new team areas. Give your team area a name, an address and a capacity information.

NAME.LABEL: Team area name
NAME.ERROR: Please enter a team area name

CREATED.TITLE: Awesome!
CREATED.MESSAGE: You successfully created your team area.

NAME_EXISTS.TITLE: Create Team Area failed!
NAME_EXISTS.MESSAGE: This team area name is already in usage. Please choose a new name.

ERROR.TITLE: Create Team Area failed!
ERROR.MESSAGE: Could not create the team area. Please try again later.

EDIT_AREA.PAGE_DESCRIPTION: As a manager, you can change the capacity and address of your team areas.

NAME.LABEL: Team area name
NAME.ERROR: Please enter a team area name

SUCCESS.TITLE: Awesome
SUCCESS.MESSAGE: You successfully edited the team area!

ERROR.TITLE: Error!
ERROR.MESSAGE: Edit team area failed. Please try again later.

USER_PROFILE.PAGE_DESCRIPTION: Specify your settings: You can add your first and last name that will be displayed in your profile instead of your email address. Additionally you can agree to an Opt-In, which allows to make your personal data (e. g. name) visible to others in the bookings.

DATA_PRIVACY_AGREEMENT.LABEL: I agree that my personal data in the bookings are visible to other users.

SUCCESS.TITLE: Awesome
SUCCESS.MESSAGE: You successfully updated your user profile!

ERROR.TITLE: Error!
ERROR.MESSAGE: It seems something went wrong while updating your user profile.

POST_BOOKING.PAGE_TITLE: How we protect ourselves and our colleagues
POST_BOOKING.PAGE_DESCRIPTION: When you check into the office, take care of you health and protect your colleagues by doing the following basic protective measures against COVID-19:

FORM.FURTHER_DETAILS: For further details please refer to the corresponding
